desc: Killwood takes the wood from those pine beetle killed trees and creates sustainable lifestyle goods that offset CO2. Killwood products are handcrafted from wood devastated by the mountain Bine Beetle and designed with Japanese minimalism in mid. Built to last by experienced woodworkers with 20+ years experience.

layout.text: Killwood takes the wood from pine beetle killed trees in BC and creates sustainable lifestyle goods that offset CO2. Our products use upcycled waste materials, and contribute to regrowing local forests.
